description: Smart Storage lockers x 4 locations for CBSA assets - Radios.
full_summary:
# Smart Storage Solution Procurement

## Solicitation Information

*   **Notice Reference (#)**: WS3760936672
*   **Notice Title (English)**: 47648-225900 - Smart Storage Solution procurement
*   **Notice Title (French)**: Approvisionnement Solution de stockage intelligente
*   **Publication Date**: 2022-12-09

## Tender Details

*   **Solicitation Number**: WS3760936672
*   **Closing Time**: 2023-01-19T14:00:00
*   **Amendment Number**: 2
*   **Amendment Date**: 2023-01-10

## Procurement Category

*   **Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
*   **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)

## Supply Information

*   **UNSPC**: 24000000
*   **UNSPC**: 48102100
*   **UNSPC**: 56101520
*   **UNSPC**: 56111803
*   **UNSPC**: 56121801
*   **UNSPC**: 56122002
*   **Description**: Storage and handling equipment, lockers, freestanding storage cabinets, technical education tool storage cabinets, laboratory storage units and accessories.

## Area of Purchase

*   **Region of Opportunity**: Ontario (except National Capital Region)
*   **Region of Delivery**: Ontario (except National Capital Region)

## Contact Information

*   **Name**: Christopher Casale, Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Email**: christopher.casale@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   **Phone**: 343-575-5249

## Proposal Submission Guidelines

*   **Notice URL**: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14857409?extsite=MTQ4NTc0MDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>
*   **Bid Submissions**: The bid must include all required supporting documentation. Late bids received after 2023-01-18T14:00:00 EST will be declared non-responsive and will not be considered.

## Technical Criteria

*   The bidder must provide a detailed proposal outlining how the smart storage locker system meets each mandatory technical criterion.

## Trade Agreements

*   The bid is open to bidders who can
